job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Our client is looking for an exceptional Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications.

   You will work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack.

   Job specifics:
     * Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
     * Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
     * Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation.
     * Upt to 80% work from home is possible.
job_details.full_text:
Cloud Backend Software Engineer - Golang

Our client is looking for an exceptional Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications.

   You will work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack.

   Job specifics:
     * Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
     * Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
     * Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation.
     * Upt to 80% work from home is possible.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on backend software engineering for cloud-native environments and distributed systems, specifically mentioning Kubernetes and Golang. While it mentions supporting LLM applications, it does not detail core generative AI tasks like fine-tuning, RAG development, or advanced prompt engineering. The primary focus is on building robust backend systems and infrastructure, which aligns more with traditional software engineering than a specialized GenAI Engineer role. It lacks the depth in generative modeling and application development characteristic of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'developing high-performance, scalable software solutions', 'designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform', 'Implement robust backend systems', and 'seamless integration with backend systems', all of which are core software development activities.
The role involves building and integrating systems, which falls under software development.
job_tasks.phrase: designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform

job_tasks.justification: Implementing backend systems is a direct software development task.
Collaboration with DevOps and front-end teams for integration is a common software development practice.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems

job_tasks.justification: Driving test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation are essential parts of the software development lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'streaming APIs' and 'network protocols' relates to data handling and infrastructure, which can be considered part of data engineering in a broader sense, especially in cloud-native contexts.
The mention of 'network protocols' relates to data handling and infrastructure, which can be considered part of data engineering in a broader sense, especially in cloud-native contexts.

The role is described as being for 'Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments', and collaboration with 'DevOps' teams is mentioned, indicating a focus on operational aspects of deployment and infrastructure management.
Collaboration with DevOps teams is a direct indicator of involvement in operations engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams
